post.text:
"I want a president who stands up against intolerance."

The cast of Empire on why they're with Hillary. IWillVote.com

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: Great message.... Other than protect Obamacare????? How much do those celebrities, or Hillary pay in premiums and deductibles for Obama care? How much did they make on that commercial?? STOP race baiting and using scare tactics for votes. People who support other candidates are not racist and it disgusts me the division these accusations have caused this election. She needs a new campaign. That is why I started out liking her.....and changed my mind. Do people buy this?

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: She's not race baiting by having her black supporters...well...support her.

replies.author: David
replies.text: Sarah she is using them for votes only. She has done nothing for the black communities, she is from Chicago and did nothing for them.

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: She is race baiting! "Donald Trump is a racist" "Only racist people support Trump" Then using that to push herself. She weaseled in....She tries to use Obama too! People are offended. Obama does not own anyone.
